item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 14, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Show HN: Meet.hn – Meet the Hacker News community in your city (183 points | 79 comments)
3. They don't make readers like they used to (60 points | 40 comments)

8. Porting SBCL to the Nintendo Switch (362 points | 64 comments)
9. Icon (real creators, AI ads) is hiring founding engineers (NYC) ( | hide)
10. Techniques I use to create a great user experience for shell scripts (339 points | 179 comments)
11. U.S. Govt pushes Nvidia and Apple to use Intel's foundries (5 points | discuss)

24. Do Animals Know That They Will Die? (36 points | 10 comments)

26. Coupled Oscillators for Computing (35 points | 8 comments)
27. Ambient Meaning and the Algorithms of Culture (22 points | 7 comments)
28. Gottfried Mind, the Raphael of Cats (35 points | discuss)
29. Thomas Piketty: 'The Draghi report is a step in the right direction' (5 points | discuss)
30. Martin Luther King Jr. In Berlin (84 points | 22 comments)
